text: Gustavo Ayon (b. 1 April 1985) was a Mexican former NBA basketball player. He was born in Tepic, Mexico. He used to play for the Orlando Magic. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Mexican basketball players Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:New Orleans Hornets players Category:Orlando Magic players Category:People from Nayarit
title: Gustavo Ayon
